title: [FEATURE] Dependency problem for linux
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

When I added nuget to my project that I developed with .net 8 and ran it on Docker, an error was received. The dependencies coming from .net standard 2.1 were not at a sufficient level.

### Describe the solution you would like

To prevent this and similar errors in the new package version, you can add the SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux package to the dependencies.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

I solved the problem by adding the package named SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux to the dependencies.

### Additional context

_No response_
